original_text: And as soon as he was king, he killed all the house of Jeroboam. He left to the house of Jeroboam not one that breathed, until he had destroyed it, according to the word of the Lord that he spoke by his servant Ahijah the Shilonite.
korean_text: 왕이 될 때에 여로보암의 온 집을 쳐서 생명 있는 자를 한 사람도 남기지 아니하고 다 멸하였는데 여호와께서 그의 종 실로 사람 아히야를 통하여 하신 말씀과 같이 되었으니

sentences.original_text: And as soon as he was king,
he killed all the house of Jeroboam.
He left to the house of Jeroboam not one that breathed,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여로보암의 집안에서 숨 쉬는 자 한 사람도 남기지 아니하고,

sentences.original_text: according to the word of the Lord
by his servant Ahijah the Shilonite.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 종 실로 사람 아히야를 통하여.
